sumpot.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ===================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              SUMPOT
00004 !
00005 !   Calculate potential of particle from interaction list
00006 !   Pseudoparticles are given by: intlist(j,p), j=1,nterm(p)
00007 !
00008 !  ===================================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine sumpot(p, n, inode, pote)
00011 
00012   use treevars
00013 
00014   integer, intent(in) :: p  ! particle label
00015   integer, dimension(1:n) :: inode
00016 
00017   !  work arrays
00018   real, dimension(1:n) :: dx,dy,dz,d,dx2,dy2,dz2,d3,d5,eq1,eq2,eq3,eq4,eq5,eq6,petotal
00019 
00020   real pote, eps2
00021 
00022   eps2=eps**2
00023 
00024  !  preprocess distances - loops implicit from 1 -> n
00025 
00026   dx = x(p) - xcoc( inode )
00027   dy = y(p) - ycoc( inode )
00028   dz = z(p) - zcoc( inode ) 
00029 
00030   !  sum potential to quadrupole
00031   !       ep(p)=ep(p)+Epm+Epd+Epq
00032 
00033   dx2 = dx**2
00034   dy2 = dy**2
00035   dz2 = dz**2
00036   d = sqrt(dx2+dy2+dz2+eps2)
00037   d3 = d**3
00038   d5 = d**5
00039 
00040   eq1 = 0.5*( 3*dx2/d5 - 1/d3 )
00041   eq2 = 0.5*( 3*dy2/d5 - 1/d3 )
00042   eq3 = 0.5*( 3*dz2/d5 - 1/d3 )
00043   eq4 = 3*dx*dy/d5
00044   eq5 = 3*dy*dz/d5
00045   eq6 = 3*dx*dz/d5
00046 
00047   petotal =   charge( inode )/d    &                                     !  monopole term
00048        !
00049             + (dx*xdip( inode ) + dy*ydip( inode ) + dz*zdip( inode ))/d3  &    !  dipole
00050        !
00051             + eq1*xxquad( inode ) + eq2*yyquad( inode ) + eq3*zzquad( inode )  &  !  quadrupole
00052             + eq4*xyquad( inode ) + eq5*yzquad( inode ) + eq6*zxquad( inode )      
00053 
00054   !  add up contributions
00055   pote = SUM(petotal)
00056 
00057 end subroutine sumpot
